statements: UPDATE flood_prone_areas SET city='New York', state='NY' WHERE area_id=1

UPDATE properties SET latitude=40.7128, longitude=-74.0060 WHERE id=1;

UPDATE flood_prone_areas SET area_name='Central Park Area', area_polygon=ST_GeomFromText('POLYGON((40.7829 -73.9654, 40.6971 -74.2568, 40.4943 -74.1000, 40.6994 -73.8298, 40.7829 -73.9654))') WHERE area_id=5;

UPDATE flood_prone_areas SET coordinates = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(-74.0060 40.7128)', 4326) WHERE area_name = 'New York City';
